title: Charming Waterfront Studio Retreat in Polnocne, Suwałki – Ideal for Entrepreneurs
description: Welcome to this inviting and cleverly designed studio in picturesque Polnocne, Suwałki. Offering a spacious 36 sqm layout, this property features a practical open-plan bedroom, a modern bathroom, and an airy living space that opens onto a lovely outdoor dining area. Solar panels and an EV charging station make it perfect for the eco-conscious owner, while wheelchair accessibility ensures modern convenience for everyone. Thoughtful amenities like a guest bathroom, a resident shared sauna, and ample natural light create a welcoming, homely vibe.
neighborhood_description: Nestled close to local schools and just a stone's throw from tranquil waterfront walks, the Polnocne neighborhood embodies a relaxed pace of life and scenic historic charm. Residents here enjoy a peaceful environment framed by green spaces, yet benefit from quick highway connections—making it perfect for those seeking quiet comfort with easy commuting options.
lifestyle_benefits: flexible live–work space for small business owners
easy access to main highways for business travel
target_buyer: A solo entrepreneur or a couple seeking a comforting escape from busy urban life, looking for a smart, green home office with quick connections to regional hubs, plus nearby relaxation and inspiration.
market_positioning: This modern eco-friendly studio appeals to business-minded individuals who value sustainability and need both privacy and connections. Distinctively positioned in a peaceful, up-and-coming residential area with excellent driving access, it offers a competitively priced entry into Polnocne’s property market, perfect for those establishing roots and entrepreneurial endeavours.
